public class AreaTri {

	public static double area_tri(float l,float b)
	{
		//double area=((0.5)*(l*b));
		return ((0.5)*(l*b));
        }

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		double areaoftri=area_tri(12,7);
		System.out.println("the area of triangle is " +areaoftri);

	}

}
